A technique used by [[Konohagakure]] to trap the enemy in a maze of tall walls. The user bangs a [[Mechanical Eight Trigrams Formation Drum|giant Taiko drum]] which causes countless walls to appear around the village, cornering the enemy. Additionally, if one tries to escape by scaling the walls, net traps will make short work of said escape.
